document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">"Wolfe" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">demanded </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">during </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">Dying </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"Which </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">Control </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">Day"? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">"General, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">British" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">"Easy" </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">Answered </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">Wolfe, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">die" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">"Montcalm", </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">opposing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">Spirit </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">Rendered </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">smile </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">"Sweet", </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">said </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"My </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">own </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">Surrender </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">Liberty's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">forestall </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">-" </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Wolfe demanded during dying
